title: Sedimentation kinetics and stability mechanisms of iron and manganese colloids in simulated groundwater
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,3114-3123
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00811H, Paper
Shuxin Huang, Caixiang Zhang, Lu Chen, Ruihan Xiong, Jiasen Li, Jidao Xie, Zenghui Fan, You Lv
The occurrence of different forms of iron and manganese colloids in the subsurface environment has been widely reported.
